level.heading: Transfer of assets.
level.text: All assets which, on May 8, 1996, are components of the Correctional Industries Fund, as created by § 24-271 [repealed], shall be transferred to the Fund created in § 24-231.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-117
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-117, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-231.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Mayor authorized to issue rules: Section 19 of D.C. Law 11-117 provided that, in accordance with subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, the Mayor shall issue rules to implement this subchapter.
